content: I want to prove that Mathlib's configuration.projective_plane.exists_config is equivalent to an alternative nondegeneracy axiom, which says that there are four points no three of which are collinear. I'll refer to those axioms as exists_config and exists_config_alt. I've finished the forward direction, that exists_config implies exists_config_alt, but am confused about the correct way to proceed for the reverse. Should I not have import combinatorics.configuration for that, since that assumes exists_config?
Instead of [configuration.projective_plane P L], I did [configuration.has_lines P L] [configuration.has_points P L], which seems to be what I want.
Quinn Culver has marked this topic as resolved.
